content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"What are standards?\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"International Standards make things work. They give world-class specifications for products, services and systems, to ensure quality, safety and efficiency. They are instrumental in facilitating international trade.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM has established and manages its business processes as a unified system and integrating ISO 9001:2015, ISO 27001:2013, ISAE 3402, statutory and regulatory requirements while implementing state-of-the-art technology.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"QMS is maintained with respect to applicable requirements of CMMI, ISO 13485:2016, EN ISO 14971:2019, IEC 62304:2006/AMD1:2015, ISO 14001:2015, PCI-DSS to satisfy specific contract requirements.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Following is a summary of these standards.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"ISO 9001\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"ISO is an independent, non-governmental international organization which brings together experts to share knowledge and develop voluntary, consensus-based, market relevant International Standards that support innovation and provide solutions to global challenges. One of its most powerful products is ISO series 9000.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/d995ff9c-1f2e-4573-afd8-06c78af180ab/ISO_logo.png\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":173,\"height\":69}},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The ISO 9000 family addresses various aspects of quality management. These standards provide guidance and tools for companies and organizations who want to ensure that their products and services consistently meet customer's requirements, and that quality is consistently improved. The central standard is ISO 9001.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-quote\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"ISO 9001 sets out the criteria for a quality management system. This standard is based on a number of quality management principles including a strong customer focus, the motivation and implication of top management, the process approach and continual improvement.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"ISO 9001 does not dictate which exact processes a company must employ and how they must interact, it simply defines the general principles of their implementation and monitoring. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM offices stay in line with ISO 9001, this is confirmed by the relevant certificates, see \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://epam.sharepoint.com/sites/policy/EPAM%20Certificates/Forms/EPAM%20Certificates.aspx?viewid=b76e70d1%2D6767%2D4dd0%2D86dc%2Dc1c41adc4762&useFiltersInViewXml=1&FilterField1=Standart&FilterValue1=ISO%209001&FilterType1=MultiChoice&FilterOp1=Eq\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"ISO 9001 Certified EPAM locations\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"ISO/IEC 27001\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"ISO/IEC 27001\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" is an information security standard, part of the ISO/IEC 27000 family of standards.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"ISO/IEC 27001\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" defines requirements for Information Security Management System. EPAM successfully implemented these requirements, this is confirmed by the relevant certificates: see \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://epam.sharepoint.com/sites/policy/EPAM%20Certificates/Forms/EPAM%20Certificates.aspx?viewid=b76e70d1%2D6767%2D4dd0%2D86dc%2Dc1c41adc4762&useFiltersInViewXml=1&FilterField1=Standart&FilterValue1=ISO%2027001&FilterType1=MultiChoice&FilterOp1=Eq\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"ISO offices\\r.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Other standards in the ISO/IEC 27000 family of standards provide additional guidance on certain aspects of designing, implementing and operating an ISMS, for example on information security risk management (ISO/IEC 27005).\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"ISAE 3402\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"International Standard on Assurance Engagements 3402 (ISAE 3402)\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\", titled Assurance Reports on Controls at a Service Organization, is an international assurance standard that prescribes Service Organization Control (SOC) reports, which gives assurance to an organization's customers and service users that the service organization has adequate internal controls.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Annually, an \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"ISAE 3402 \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"(International Standard on Assurance Engagements) audit takes place, and results of this audit are reflected in the reports. See more  -   \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://epam.sharepoint.com/sites/policy/EPAM%20Certificates/Forms/EPAM%20Certificates.aspx?viewid=b76e70d1%2D6767%2D4dd0%2D86dc%2Dc1c41adc4762&useFiltersInViewXml=1&FilterField1=Standart&FilterValue1=ISAE%203402&FilterType1=MultiChoice&FilterOp1=Eq\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"ISAE 3402 Certified EPAM offices.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"ISO 13485\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Many manufacturers of medical devices turn to subcontractors for the production of whole products, separate components supply and provision of related services (including IT ones). To minimize the need for the manufacturers to audit such suppliers it is important that they (the suppliers) have an ISO 13485 certificate of conformity.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"ISO 13485 defines the requirements for a quality management system that can be used by an organization in the design, manufacturing, and maintenance of medical devices, as well as in the provision of related services.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The main requirements of the international standard ISO 13485 are based on the requirements of ISO 9001. However, since the ISO 13485 standard is entirely devoted to medical devices and related services, it contains a number of additional requirements affecting various areas of the medical device industry.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM successfully implemented ISO13485 requirements, this is confirmed by the relevant certificates: see 14001\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" defines the criteria for Environmental Management System (hereinafter – EMS), part of the ISO 14000 family of standards. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"ISO 14000\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" is a family of standards related to environmental management that exists to help organizations:\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"which minimizes how their operations (processes, etc.) negatively affect the environment (i.e. cause adverse changes to air, water, or land);\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"creates \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"helps to continually improve in the above. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"ISO 14001, like other ISO 14000 standards, are voluntary, where the main aim is to assist companies in continually improving their environmental performance and complying with any applicable legislation. Administered by the \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"CMMI Institute\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\", it was developed at Carnegie Mellon University (CMU). It is required by many U.S. Government contracts, especially in software development. CMU claims CMMI can be used to guide process improvement across a project, division, or an entire organization.
